name: Emmanuel de Rouge and the Amulet of Quetzalcoatl [FREE][GAME]
name_original: Emmanuel de Rouge and the Amulet of Quetzalcoatl [FREE][GAME]
description:
Made for the 7DRL game jam (https://itch.io/jam/7drl-challenge-2020)

Cliff Tull (https://combosmooth.itch.io/) - Art

Zoltan Kosina (github.com/kosinaz) - Code

Elijah Fisch (www.elijahfisch.com) - Music

additional sounds by www.zapsplat.com

How to play:

Move - Left click on mouse, arrow keys or WASD.

Attack - Click on enemies or move into them.

Use Medkit - Click on self, click the med kit in hud or click ENTER key.
